snippet: Chris Kreider is transitioning from Boston College’s championship to practicing with the Rangers for the postseason.
abstract: Collegiate hockey forward Chris Kreider joins the New York Rangers for the playoffs, though it remains unclear what role he might play; Kreider is coming off winning the NCAA hockey championship with Boston College.
lead_paragraph: Chris Kreider is transitioning from Boston College’s championship to practicing with the Rangers for the postseason.

headline.seo: Kreider, N.C.A.A. Champion, Joins Rangers for Playoffs
headline.main: N.C.A.A. Champion Joins Rangers for the Playoffs
headline.print_headline: N.C.A.A. Champion Joins Rangers for the Playoffs
